name: idajs
description: IdaJS game engine for Little Big Adventure 2 game modding
author: Andriy Tevelyev

scripts.patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json package-lock.json && node version-commit.js && node release.js
scripts.minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json package-lock.json && node version-commit.js && node release.js
scripts.major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json package-lock.json && node version-commit.js && node release.js
scripts.docs: node generate-readme.js && npx typedoc && npx open-cli ./docs/index.html
scripts.publish:types: node check-publish.js srcjs/types && node publish-package.js srcjs/types
scripts.publish:types:dev: node check-publish.js srcjs/types --dev-publish && node publish-package.js srcjs/types --dev
scripts.publish:create: node check-publish.js srcjs/create-mod && node publish-package.js srcjs/create-mod
scripts.publish:create:dev: node check-publish.js srcjs/create-mod --dev-publish && node publish-package.js srcjs/create-mod --dev
scripts.publish:docs: node check-publish.js srcjs/types README.template.md && node generate-readme.js && node generate-typedoc-config.js && node publish-docs.js && rm README.md && node generate-typedoc-config.js --reset
scripts.publish:docs:update: node check-publish.js srcjs/types README.template.md --dev-publish && node generate-readme.js && node generate-typedoc-config.js && node publish-docs.js && rm README.md && node generate-typedoc-config.js --reset
